statements: SELECT * FROM game_sessions;
SELECT session_id, game_name, start_time FROM game_sessions WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT game_name, start_time, end_time FROM game_sessions WHERE session_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM game_sessions WHERE game_name = 'Chess';
SELECT player_id, game_name, start_time, end_time FROM game_sessions WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT session_id, player_id, game_name, start_time, end_time FROM game_sessions ORDER BY start_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM game_sessions WHERE player_id = 100 AND game_name = 'Chess';
SELECT session_id, player_id, game_name, start_time, end_time FROM game_sessions WHERE player_id = 200 ORDER BY end_time ASC;
SELECT session_id, player_id, game_name, start_time, end_time FROM game_sessions WHERE game_name LIKE '%Solitaire%' ORDER BY session_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) as total_sessions FROM game_sessions GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_sessions > 3 ORDER BY total_sessions DESC;
SELECT * FROM GameSessions;
SELECT session_id, game_name, start_time FROM GameSessions;
SELECT player_id, game_name, end_time FROM GameSessions;
SELECT session_id, player_id, game_name, start_time, end_time FROM GameSessions;
SELECT * FROM CompetitionResults;
SELECT * FROM GameSessions WHERE player_id = 1234;
SELECT game_name, start_time, end_time FROM GameSessions WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, competition_name, score FROM CompetitionResults ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT session_id, player_id, game_name, competition_name, score FROM GameSessions JOIN CompetitionResults ON GameSessions.session_id = CompetitionResults.session_id;
SELECT game_name, COUNT(session_id) AS sessions_count FROM GameSessions GROUP BY game_name;
SELECT * FROM game_sessions LIMIT 5;
SELECT session_id, session_date, game_type FROM game_sessions WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT session_id, placing FROM competition_results ORDER BY placing DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT game_type FROM game_sessions;
SELECT player_id, AVG(score) AS avg_score FROM player_scores GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM game_sessions WHERE session_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, session_id, score FROM player_scores ORDER BY score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_id, session_id, placing FROM competition_results WHERE player_id = 1 AND session_id = 10;
SELECT session_id, game_type FROM game_sessions WHERE game_type IN ('Puzzle', 'Adventure') ORDER BY session_id DESC;
SELECT competition_id, player_id, placing FROM competition_results WHERE placing <= 3 ORDER BY placing ASC, competition_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM GameSessions;
SELECT session_id, game_name, session_date FROM GameSessions WHERE session_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT game_name, location FROM GameSessions ORDER BY game_name DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM PlayerScores WHERE score > 100;
SELECT player_name, age, country FROM PlayerProfiles WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM GameSessions;
SELECT session_id, game_name FROM GameSessions ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, score, session_date FROM PlayerScores JOIN GameSessions ON PlayerScores.session_id = GameSessions.session_id WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY session_date ASC;
SELECT player_name, age, country FROM PlayerProfiles WHERE age > 25 AND country = 'USA';

SELECT CompetitionResults.competition_name, PlayerProfiles.player_name AS winner, PlayerProfiles.age AS winner_age, PlayerProfiles.country AS winner_country, PlayerProfiles2.player_name AS runner_up, PlayerProfiles2.age AS runner_up_age, PlayerProfiles2.country AS runner_up_country FROM CompetitionResults JOIN PlayerProfiles ON CompetitionResults.winner_id = PlayerProfiles.player_id JOIN PlayerProfiles AS PlayerProfiles2 ON CompetitionResults.runner_up_id = PlayerProfiles2.player_id;
SELECT * FROM game_sessions;
SELECT player_id, player_name, score FROM player_scores ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT competition_name, competition_date FROM competitions WHERE competition_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM competition_results WHERE winner_id = 101 OR runner_up_id = 102;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players WHERE player_id IN (SELECT winner_id FROM competition_results);
SELECT * FROM player_scores WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, score FROM player_scores WHERE score BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT session_id, session_date FROM game_sessions WHERE session_duration > '02:00:00' ORDER BY session_date;
SELECT competition_name, competition_date FROM competitions ORDER BY competition_date DESC;
